CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

notes say Chi was fidgity at first and indeed his performance isn't as impressive as it was when he read the book at HV3; most of Chi's errors are saying a instead of one; the hard words don't trip him up; Mot doesn't have much to do; she points to some words on Saturday page and perhaps helps with inflection?; Mot turns pages

u.a: context notes say Mot repeats <how it was supposed to be said> but Chi's prosody didn't seem bad for <and very hungry>
MOT points to some words , perhaps the ones that Chi repeats on these pages

CHAT.comment: Chi runs to kitchen , inspired by story to get some food; Mot jokes that Chi might go into a cocoon in a couple weeks
